arts.ttl: Thomas Frank pays tribute to Guglielmo Vicario after Tottenham draw at Monaco
arts.sum: Heroics by Guglielmo Vicario helped Tottenham move onto five points from three Champions League games.

arts.ttl: Spurs ride luck in Monaco but fans deliver verdict on dismal show
arts.sum: Spurs rode their luck to earn a Champions League point in Monaco - but no-one will fear them on this evidence says chief football writer Phil McNulty

arts.ttl: Tottenham goalkeeper Guglielmo Vicario is accused of TIME-WASTING by Monaco boss after his heroics earn vital Champions League point
arts.sum: Monaco peppered Vicario's goal with 23 shots, but the Italian keeper made a series of splendid saves as Spurs recorded their first goalless draw since March 2023.

arts.ttl: Monaco 0-0 Tottenham: Vicario helps Spurs escape with draw
arts.sum: But the highlight was Vicario's save from Jordan Teze just 15 minutes from time as the Spurs stopper clawed away the midfielder's header from point-blank range. Folarin Balogun was unable to beat Vicario with two successive efforts towards the end of the first half; the Italian did particularly well to get down to the second, a firm strike low to his left.

arts.ttl: Valiant Vicario saves Spurs in scrappy Champions League draw against Monaco
arts.sum: Thomas Frank's Tottenham Hotspur escape Stade Louis-II with a point after a 0-0 draw with Sebastien Pocognoli's Monaco in the Champions League on Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Tottenham player ratings vs Monaco: Vicario bails out drab Lilywhites
arts.sum: Spurs' goalkeeper was the hero during a stalemate in the principality.

arts.ttl: Vicario heroics help Spurs survive Monaco onslaught to claim fortunate draw
arts.sum: Guglielmo Vicario made a string of fine saves as Tottenham hung on for a fortunate goalless draw at Monaco to remain unbeaten in this season’s Champions League.

arts.ttl: Monaco vs Tottenham: Champions League match stream, latest team news, lineups, TV, prediction
arts.sum: Spurs looking to return to winning ways in Europe

arts.ttl: Monaco’s Sébastien Pocognoli says no ‘urgency’ for points ahead of Tottenham clash
arts.sum: After two matchdays, AS Monaco have just one point on the board in the UEFA Champions League. Ahead of Wednesday night’s match against Tottenham Hotspur, new manager Sébastien Pocognoli says…
